Hi all,

but I've only been =
a member for a year. I'm currently doing research on

veral people in my group know about it, but
"officially" we as a group do n=
ot 'conjur' due to the fact that no one

contacting from beyond the grave, and
an invitation to an 'evil' spirit can=
 cause serious problems. Problems

rs of our group who have been

      I ser=
iously would like to learn all I can about this box, and

n get about it.

d.Pille
